jd: From: Kunal Bhatt, Resource Consultings kunal.bhatt@rconsultinginc.com Reply to: kunal.bhatt@rconsultinginc.com Job Title : Business Analyst With Retail Exp Location Remote Job DescriptionHaving Good experience In RetailOur client is looking for a Consultant for a Business Analyst function to gather and write requirements- initial contract will be through Jan 2025 with likely extension at least through July 2025This is a remote opportunity but MUST reside in the US and ability to work EST.Having good expeience in Agile and Waterfall methodology.
